duties_responsibilities.duty: Process invoices, review reconciliations, and credit memos using our software.
Respond to vendor inquiries regarding statements, short payments, and other questions.
Research vendor questions on invoice discrepancies.
Utilize analytical skills and detail orientation to ensure key performance indicators (KPI’s) are achieved.
Propose solutions to the challenges of our business using creative and “outside of the box” thinking skills.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED equivalent required, Associates degree with a minimum 2.7 GPA preferred
